title: Cold plasma technology for sustainable food production: meeting the United Nations sustainable development goals
content:
Sustainable Food Technol., 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D4FB00209A, Review Article

Fabiano A. N. Fernandes, Sueli Rodrigues
This review explores the contributions of cold plasma technologies to the UN Sustainable Development Goals. We correlate cold plasma and the SDGs, showing its contributions, advantages, limitations, and how it promotes sustainable food production.
